alert.note: Alert for Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorm will impact portions of western Suffolk County through 700 PM EDT... At 631 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm over Plainview, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 30 mph and isolated lightning strikes. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Isolated lightning strikes will pose a danger to those outdoors. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Melville around 635 PM EDT. Deer Park and Dix Hills around 645 PM EDT. Commack and Bay Shore around 650 PM EDT. Islip and Brentwood around 655 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk
